text: Thanks, Luke. I was able to get around this issue by first upserting the Contact again using ecommerce bridge and then creating the Deal with the association.

Hi, I am creating Deals and Line items using ecommerce bridge using our own unique identifier as the externalObjectId. Now, I would like to get the corresponding Deal/Line_Item using the same externalObjectId and I am not able to do that using the endpoint /crm-objects/v1/objects/line_items/my-external-object-id. I am also not able to filter it out after getting all line items from the endpoint /crm-objects/v1/objects/line_items/paged because it has no reference of externalObjectId on the response. Please advise.

Thanks for posting that <@U22PKFRU5> I would have missed this otherwise.  <@UKH1SJ1L5> The externalObjectId only applies to e-commerce bridge APIs.  FOr the line_item API youâ€™ll need the HubSpot assigned Id. You can get those by doing a get all line items <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/line-items/get-all-line-items> The same applies to deals but with this endpoint instead <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/deals/get-all-deals>
